conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully creates a 3D cutaway representation with consistent wall thickness and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric conversion; walls and floors are clearly defined with proper cutaway logic.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is largely faithful. Note: The angled bump-out in the living room and stairs are correctly placed, but some interior door swings are simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen island and major plumbing fixtures are represented as block geometry in correct locations.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; lighting provides clear readability of the structure without UI contamination.

detected_errors.description: Some door swing indicators from the 2D plan are rendered as simple openings or partial walls.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D transformation that accurately preserves the complex spatial layout of the original floor plan.
